It seems like you want to watch a game on the TV by the credenza and dim the lights in that area. Since you enjoy soccer and basketball, I can assume you're referring to a game in one of those sports. 

I'll go ahead and dim the lights by the TV. However, I don't have the specific game details to put on the TV. If you have a specific game in mind, please let me know! 

Now, let me dim the lights by the TV.
